text: 11.26: Sng 14.7; Ais 59.20; Mt 23.39Mba tuavra Fhe Bakɨme taagip za Isreriŋ ndigɨrga. Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gap ne suaŋgi. Fhe Bakɨmen gap khaŋ nzuai, “Isrerin kurkurav taagi mbe ndirga guma, ana Zerusareman kegɨp, khavgip, zɨrga. Ana zɨv, mba Zekop shɨgar gumgi gu mbigi, ana mben muuŋrim, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvi daasui tɨvi thav, ana zɨn ŋgɨrga.
